unnormalised: Bore, tum havamaanachea andaza vishim vichartat, hakaai? Mhaka Mumbai-nt, IMD mhonta ki amkam 27/07/2024 hea tarikher bhari pavs poddtele. Tannim orange alert dil'la, zachem orth asa ki tumi addchnanim khatir toyaar ravat. Fattlea satollear, 19/07/2024-ak, Dadar station lagim 6:30 PM chea vellar bhari pavsak lagun vodlem udok bhortelem. Ashaa asa, tannim hea vellar chodd borem toyaar keli ashi.
normalised: Borem, tum havamaanche andazaan vixim vichartaat, barem? Mumbaint, I-M-D sangta ki aami sattavis July don hazaar ani chovisacher daatt pausachi apeksha karunk xakta. Tannim ek orange alert jaari kela, jem muleen dhonddpaan khatir toyar rava mhunn sangta. Fatlyaa satodyak, uunis July don hazaar ani chovisacher, Dadar stationa laggi saanjchea saaade saak vaddeche udkaan bhartaa challem. Aasha asa ki te favo te toyar korpak chuknaant.

unnormalised: Havamaanacho andaz ullekh korta ki udentichea toofanaachi sambhavanaa udyaa donparchea 15:00 vaztam ashi. Mhaka Delhi-ntlea mhojea cousin-an sanglem ki tankam uz'vaacho zallo asa. Dissota, theanchi temperature 28/07/2024-ak 43°C poriant paunchi apeksha asa. Kitli viprit tulna, hakaai? Hanven ek khobro channel-ar dekhlem ki Kerala-chea kaim bhaganim pavsak ukheer zala.
normalised: Favo asa ki te favo te toyar korpak chuknaant. Havamaanache andazaan udkaanche garjan zaatlem, jachi sakala teen vosamni mahdollika asta. Dhillen eka maamlekarak sangta ki thande haavache vaare bhov thandakaai aamkhi asta. Dhillen eka maamlekarak sangta ki thande haavache vaare bhov thandakaai aamkhi asta. Aasa asa ki don hazaar chovisancher tamo cheyall chittrees degree celsius parayanth pauchache asa. Vichitra vishay, na? Makaan eka nvees chyanelacher dislem ki pavsaane dhilo kelaa keralaachea thoddo bhaagaant.

unnormalised: Kitem-ui aso, tum फक्त खबरोcher dolea dovorat ani jarurichem nhoi zalear Mumbai-nt 27/07/24 hea tarikher bhonvpak talla. Nontopori surakshit ravop bore! Tumchi chhatri ani raincoat gheun vorunk yead dhorat. Ani tum Delhi-nt asli zalear, udok piyat ani donparchea chodd vellar bhair vochunk talla. Hears!
normalised: Konnasat, nveesacher dyaan di ani jannvarak yatrak jao nakka, tum Mumbaaint sattavis July don hazaar chovisacher asaali to. Sangaata yeyaa peksa borem! Tumchi chatri ani raincoat gheun vaar. Ani tum Delhiicher asataali to, udak piya ani munjdiche vella kherit baar jaavun nakka. Borem asa!
